revised_title: Effects of Temperature and Humidity on Air Quality and Ventilation
tldr: The author conducted experiments to understand the effects of temperature and humidity on air quality and ventilation. They discovered that an increase of 1% in humidity has the same impact on air quality as a rise of 4.18 degrees Fahrenheit in temperature. This emphasizes the importance of maintaining proper hygrometric conditions, especially in sick rooms, to ensure good ventilation and air quality.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
